src:
Bukan Striker, MU Prioritaskan Beli Winger di Bulan Januari
05 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Klub Premier League, Manchester United diberitakan sudah menyusun rencana transfer mereka di bulan Januari nanti. Setan Merah diberitakan akan memprioritaskan transfer winger baru di bursa transfer musim dingin nanti.
Sudah menjadi rahasia umum jika Manchester United bakal belanja besar di bulan Januari nanti. Performa buruk skuat Setan Merah musim ini membuat Ed Woodward merestui Solskjaer untuk belanja besar di bulan Januari nanti.
United sendiri dirumorkan bakal memprioritaskan belanja striker. Hal ini dikarenakan Setan Merah tengah kekurangan opsi di lini tengah mereka paska ditinggal oleh Romelu Lukaku.
Namun ESPN melansir bahwa Solskjaer mengganti prioritas transfer mereka. Ia ingin mendatangkan winger baru di bulan Januari nanti.

Mengapa Solskjaer ingin membeli winger baru? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Not a Striker, MU Prioritizes Buying Winger in January
05 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Premier League club Manchester United are reported to have drawn up their transfer plans in January. Red Devils reportedly will prioritize the transfer of new winger in the transfer market next winter.
It is common knowledge that Manchester United will spend big in January. Poor performance of the Red Devils squad this season makes Ed Woodward approve Solskjaer for big spending in January.
United itself is rumored to be prioritizing striker spending. This is because the Red Devils are lacking options in their midfield after being left by Romelu Lukaku.
However ESPN reported that Solskjaer changed their transfer priorities. He wants to bring in a new winger in January.

Why does Solskjaer want to buy a new winger? Check out the information below.
